biography: Okko is a highly accomplished golfer who calls Hirsala Golf his home club.  A consistent presence at the Hector Trophée, this marks his fourth appearance in the prestigious invitational. His dedication and skill are evident in his impressive track record.

Okko’s history with the Hector Trophée is marked by both success and perseverance.  He notably triumphed at Hector Trophée VI, showcasing his ability to perform under pressure.  While he’s yet to claim the Victor trophy, his past performances, including appearances in 2022, 2023, and 2025, demonstrate his continued commitment to excellence.

Beyond his tournament wins, Okko’s journey is a testament to resilience.  He has overcome significant physical challenges, notably managing a history of back problems, to maintain his position as a top competitor. This speaks volumes about his determination and unwavering focus on his game.
